entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is introduced as a person who is part of Harry's group. She is described as leaning close to the glass and talking to the dummy.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is introduced as a person who gives Harry another shove between the shoulder blades to urge him forward.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as a person who is part of Tonks' group. He is described as thinking about how absurd it was for Tonks to expect the dummy to hear her talking quietly through a sheet of glass.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is introduced as a person who is part of Harry's group. She is described as being seized by Tonks and stepping right through the glass.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is introduced as a person who is part of Harry's group. She is described as being seized by Tonks and stepping right through the glass.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is introduced as a person who steps after Ginny and Mrs Weasley.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is introduced as a person who steps after Ginny and Mrs Weasley.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is introduced as a person who steps after Ginny and Mrs Weasley.

entities.name: arthur weasley
entities.description: Arthur Weasley is introduced as the person that Tonks' group has come to see.

entities.name: dummy
entities.description: The dummy is described as being very ugly and Tonks talking to it through a sheet of glass.

relationships.description: Tonks talks to the dummy through a sheet of glass.
Tonks seizes Ginny and steps right through the glass.
Tonks seizes Mrs Weasley and steps right through the glass.
Fred follows Ginny after she is seized by Tonks.
George follows Mrs Weasley after she is seized by Tonks.
Ron follows Ginny after she is seized by Tonks.
Tonks' group has come to see Arthur Weasley.
